text: Kirakosyan () is an Armenian surname that may refer to *Barsegh Kirakosyan (born 1982), Armenian football defender *John Kirakosyan (1929–1985), Armenians historian and political scientist *Levan Kirakosyan (born 1973), Armenian boxer *Vrezh Kirakosyan (born in 1983), Armenian singer Category:Armenian-language surnames
title: Kirakosyan
